title: Zesty Lime Tortilla Chips
description: Crispy homemade tortilla chips flavored with a tangy lime zest and a hint of salt. Perfect for snacking or serving alongside your favorite dips.

instructions.description: Cut the corn tortillas into wedges.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan over medium heat.
Fry the tortilla wedges in batches until crispy, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Drain the chips on paper towels.
While still warm, sprinkle the chips with lime zest and salt.
